TEXT.English: Extra production from specialists; extra food from Workshops and Watermills; extra commerce from Mines and Watermills; double production speed for Factories and Coal Plants
TEXT.French: Les spécialistes rapportent de la production additionnelle, les ateliers et les moulins à eau rapportent de la nourriture additionnelle, et les moulins à eau et les mines rapportent du commerce additionnel ; vitesse de production doublée pour les Usines et les Centrales au charbon
TEXT.German: Extra production from specialists; extra food from Workshops and Watermills; extra commerce from Mines and Watermills; double production speed for Factories and Coal Plants
TEXT.Italian: Extra production from specialists; extra food from Workshops and Watermills; extra commerce from Mines and Watermills; double production speed for Factories and Coal Plants
TEXT.Spanish: Extra production from specialists; extra food from Workshops and Watermills; extra commerce from Mines and Watermills; double production speed for Factories and Coal Plants

TEXT.French: La doctrine religieuse la plus primitive
La doctrine territoriale la plus primitive

TEXT.English: Double available slots for artists, scientists and engineers; extra research from specialists
TEXT.French: Vous pouvez embaucher deux fois plus d'artistes, de scientifiques et d'ingénieurs ; les spécialistes rapportent de la recherche additionnelle
TEXT.German: Double available slots for artists, scientists and engineers; extra research from specialists
TEXT.Italian: Double available slots for artists, scientists and engineers; extra research from specialists
TEXT.Spanish: Double available slots for artists, scientists and engineers; extra research from specialists

TEXT.English: Extra experience for air units; extra yield from trade routes with defensive pact partners; trade routes yield production; extra war weariness
TEXT.French: Expérience additionnelle pour les unités aérienne ; les routes commerciales avec les civilisations liées par un pacte de défense rapportent davantage ; les routes commerciales rapportent de la production ; lassitude de guerre additionnelle
TEXT.German: Extra experience for air units; extra yield from trade routes with defensive pact partners; trade routes yield production; extra war weariness
TEXT.Italian: Extra experience for air units; extra yield from trade routes with defensive pact partners; trade routes yield production; extra war weariness
TEXT.Spanish: Extra experience for air units; extra yield from trade routes with defensive pact partners; trade routes yield production; extra war weariness

TEXT.English: Reduced unhappiness from corporations; extra commerce from excess happiness; extra commerce from Windmills, Nature Preserves and Marine Preserves; can spend gold to finish building production
TEXT.French: Le mécontentement lié aux sociétés commerciales est réduit ; le bonheur en excès rapporte du commerce ; les moulins à vent, les réserves naturelles et les aires marines protégées rapportent du commerce ; vous pouvez dépenser de l'or pour accélérer la construction de bâtiments
TEXT.German: Reduced unhappiness from corporations; extra commerce from excess happiness; extra commerce from Windmills, Nature Preserves and Marine Preserves; can spend gold to finish building production
TEXT.Italian: Reduced unhappiness from corporations; extra commerce from excess happiness; extra commerce from Windmills, Nature Preserves and Marine Preserves; can spend gold to finish building production
TEXT.Spanish: Reduced unhappiness from corporations; extra commerce from excess happiness; extra commerce from Windmills, Nature Preserves and Marine Preserves; can spend gold to finish building production

TEXT.English: Extra food from specialists; reduced food from farms, plantations, cottages, hamlets, villages and towns; can spend gold to finish unit production
TEXT.French: Les spécialistes rapportent de la nourriture ; les fermes, plantations, cottages, hameaux, villages et villes en rapportent moins ; vous pouvez dépenser de l'or pour accélérer la production d'unités
TEXT.German: Extra food from specialists; reduced food from farms, plantations, cottages, hamlets, villages and towns; can spend gold to finish unit production
TEXT.Italian: Extra food from specialists; reduced food from farms, plantations, cottages, hamlets, villages and towns; can spend gold to finish unit production
TEXT.Spanish: Extra food from specialists; reduced food from farms, plantations, cottages, hamlets, villages and towns; can spend gold to finish unit production

TEXT.English: No state religion; increased science in all cities; extra happiness from non-state religions; double production speed for Hospitals, Universities, Laboratories; can build wonders that require a state religion
TEXT.French: Pas de religion d'État ; science additionnelle dans toutes les villes ; bonheur additionnel pour toutes les religions ; vitesse de production doublée pour les Hôpitaux, les Universités et les Laboratoires; vous pouvez construire les merveilles qui nécessitent une religion d'État
TEXT.German: No state religion; increased science in all cities; extra happiness from non-state religions; double production speed for Hospitals, Universities, Laboratories; can build wonders that require a state religion
TEXT.Italian: No state religion; increased science in all cities; extra happiness from non-state religions; double production speed for Hospitals, Universities, Laboratories; can build wonders that require a state religion
TEXT.Spanish: No state religion; increased science in all cities; extra happiness from non-state religions; double production speed for Hospitals, Universities, Laboratories; can build wonders that require a state religion

TEXT.English: Can capture Workers; extra production from Quarries; extra commerce from Mines and Plantations
TEXT.French: Vous pouvez capturer des ouvriers ; les carrières rapportent de la production additionnelle, et les mines et les plantations rapportent du commerce additionnel
TEXT.German: Can capture Workers; extra production from Quarries; extra commerce from Mines and Plantations
TEXT.Italian: Can capture Workers; extra production from Quarries; extra commerce from Mines and Plantations
TEXT.Spanish: Can capture Workers; extra production from Quarries; extra commerce from Mines and Plantations

TEXT.English: Double available slots for priests; cities with state religion give extra experience; no spread of non-state religions
TEXT.French: Vous pouvez embaucher deux fois plus de prêtres ; les unités construites dans les villes avec la religion d'État reçoivent de l'expérience additionnelle ; les autres religions ne se propagent pas
TEXT.German: Double available slots for priests; cities with state religion give extra experience; no spread of non-state religions
TEXT.Italian: Double available slots for priests; cities with state religion give extra experience; no spread of non-state religions
TEXT.Spanish: Double available slots for priests; cities with state religion give extra experience; no spread of non-state religions

TEXT.English: Faster military unit production; no war weariness; extra production from unhappy population
TEXT.French: Production plus rapide d'unités militaires ; pas de lassitude de guerre ; la population mécontente rapporte de la production
TEXT.German: Faster military unit production; no war weariness; extra production from unhappy population
TEXT.Italian: Faster military unit production; no war weariness; extra production from unhappy population
TEXT.Spanish: Faster military unit production; no war weariness; extra production from unhappy population

TEXT.French: La doctrine sociale la plus primitive

TEXT.English: Additional units without upkeep; extra production from Farms; extra happiness from Castles
TEXT.French: Le nombre d'unités ne nécessitant pas d'entretien est accru ; les fermes rapportent de la production additionnelle ; les Châteaux créent du bonheur
TEXT.German: Additional units without upkeep; extra production from Farms; extra happiness from Castles
TEXT.Italian: Additional units without upkeep; extra production from Farms; extra happiness from Castles
TEXT.Spanish: Additional units without upkeep; extra production from Farms; extra happiness from Castles

TEXT.French: La doctrine gouvernementale la plus primitive
Les unités militaires créent du bonheur

TEXT.English: Extra commerce from tiles without improvement; extra commerce from camps and pastures; double production speed for palace
TEXT.French: Les cases non améliorées, les camps et les pâturages rapportent du commerce additionnel ; vitesse de production doublée pour les Palais
TEXT.German: Extra commerce from tiles without improvement; extra commerce from camps and pastures; double production speed for palace
TEXT.Italian: Extra commerce from tiles without improvement; extra commerce from camps and pastures; double production speed for palace
TEXT.Spanish: Extra commerce from tiles without improvement; extra commerce from camps and pastures; double production speed for palace

TEXT.English: No maintenance costs from number of cities; extra espionage from specialists
TEXT.French: Pas de coût d'entretien lié au nombre de villes ; les spécialistes rapportent des points d'espionnage
TEXT.German: No maintenance costs from number of cities; extra espionage from specialists
TEXT.Italian: No maintenance costs from number of cities; extra espionage from specialists
TEXT.Spanish: No maintenance costs from number of cities; extra espionage from specialists

TEXT.English: Double available slots for statesmen; increased great people birth rate
TEXT.French: Vous pouvez embaucher deux fois plus d'hommes d'État ; taux de natalité des personnages illustres augmenté
TEXT.German: Double available slots for statesmen; increased great people birth rate
TEXT.Italian: Double available slots for statesmen; increased great people birth rate
TEXT.Spanish: Double available slots for statesmen; increased great people birth rate

TEXT.French: La doctrine de légitimité la plus primitive

TEXT.English: Extra happiness in largest cities; double production speed for Aqueduct, Forge, Library, Market and Jail
TEXT.French: Bonheur additionnel dans les villes les plus grandes ; vitesse de production doublée pour les Aqueducs, Forges, Bibliothèques, Marchés et Prisons
TEXT.German: Extra happiness in largest cities; double production speed for Aqueduct, Forge, Library, Market and Jail
TEXT.Italian: Extra happiness in largest cities; double production speed for Aqueduct, Forge, Library, Market and Jail
TEXT.Spanish: Extra happiness in largest cities; double production speed for Aqueduct, Forge, Library, Market and Jail

TEXT.English: Extra experience for units within borders; extra food from Paddy Fields; extra commerce from Windmills and Watermills
TEXT.French: Expérience additionnelle pour les unités à l'intérieur de vos frontières ; les rizières rapportend de la nourriture additionnelle ; les moulins à vent et à eau rapportent du commerce additionnel
TEXT.German: Extra experience for units within borders; extra food from Paddy Fields; extra commerce from Windmills and Watermills
TEXT.Italian: Extra experience for units within borders; extra food from Paddy Fields; extra commerce from Windmills and Watermills
TEXT.Spanish: Extra experience for units within borders; extra food from Paddy Fields; extra commerce from Windmills and Watermills

TEXT.English: Increased production and gold in capital
TEXT.French: Production et or augmentés dans la capitale
TEXT.German: Increased production and gold in capital
TEXT.Italian: Increased production and gold in capital
TEXT.Spanish: Increased production and gold in capital

TEXT.English: Increased great general birth rate; extra production from Workshops and Lumbermills; extra happiness from News Press and Broadcasting Tower
TEXT.French: Taux de natalité des généraux illustres augmenté ; les ateliers et les scieries rapportent de la production additionnelle ; les Journaux et les Tours de radiodiffusion créent du bonheur additionnel
TEXT.German: Increased great general birth rate; extra production from Workshops and Lumbermills; extra happiness from News Press and Broadcasting Tower
TEXT.Italian: Increased great general birth rate; extra production from Workshops and Lumbermills; extra happiness from News Press and Broadcasting Tower
TEXT.Spanish: Increased great general birth rate; extra production from Workshops and Lumbermills; extra happiness from News Press and Broadcasting Tower

TEXT.English: Extra free specialist in all cities
TEXT.French: Un spécialiste gratuit dans chaque ville
TEXT.German: Extra free specialist in all cities
TEXT.Italian: Extra free specialist in all cities
TEXT.Spanish: Extra free specialist in all cities

TEXT.French: La doctrine sociale la plus primitive

TEXT.English: Reduced worker cost; extra production from Pastures; extra commerce from Farms and Orchards
TEXT.French: Coût des ouvriers diminué ; les pâturages rapportent de la production additionnelle ; les fermes et les verges rapportent du commerce additionnel
TEXT.German: Reduced worker cost; extra production from Pastures; extra commerce from Farms and Orchards
TEXT.Italian: Reduced worker cost; extra production from Pastures; extra commerce from Farms and Orchards
TEXT.Spanish: Reduced worker cost; extra production from Pastures; extra commerce from Farms and Orchards

TEXT.English: Increased growth rate for Cottages, Hamlets and Villages; extra commerce from Villages and Towns
TEXT.French: Taux de croissance augmenté pour les cottages, hameaux et villages ; les villages et les villes rapportent du commerce additionnel
TEXT.German: Increased growth rate for Cottages, Hamlets and Villages; extra commerce from Villages and Towns
TEXT.Italian: Increased growth rate for Cottages, Hamlets and Villages; extra commerce from Villages and Towns
TEXT.Spanish: Increased growth rate for Cottages, Hamlets and Villages; extra commerce from Villages and Towns

TEXT.French: La doctrine économique la plus primitive

TEXT.English: Increased food in capital; reduced commerce from trade routes; increased production speed for Granaries
TEXT.French: Nourriture additionnelle dans la capitale ; les routes commerciales rapportent moins de commerce ; vitesse de production doublée pour les Greniers
TEXT.German: Increased food in capital; reduced commerce from trade routes; increased production speed for Granaries
TEXT.Italian: Increased food in capital; reduced commerce from trade routes; increased production speed for Granaries
TEXT.Spanish: Increased food in capital; reduced commerce from trade routes; increased production speed for Granaries

TEXT.English: Extra trade route in all cities; extra happiness from Oasis
TEXT.French: Une route commerciale supplémentaire dans chaque ville ; les oasis créent du bonheur
TEXT.German: Extra trade route in all cities; extra happiness from Oasis
TEXT.Italian: Extra trade route in all cities; extra happiness from Oasis
TEXT.Spanish: Extra trade route in all cities; extra happiness from Oasis

TEXT.English: Increased commerce in capital; extra commerce from Workshops, Plantations and Slave Plantations; double production speed for Customs House
TEXT.French: Commerce augmenté dans la capitale ; les ateliers, plantations et plantations à esclaves rapportent du commerce additionel ; vitesse de production doublée pour les Postes de douane
TEXT.German: Increased commerce in capital; extra commerce from Workshops, Plantations and Slave Plantations; double production speed for Customs House
TEXT.Italian: Increased commerce in capital; extra commerce from Workshops, Plantations and Slave Plantations; double production speed for Customs House
TEXT.Spanish: Increased commerce in capital; extra commerce from Workshops, Plantations and Slave Plantations; double production speed for Customs House

TEXT.English: Double available slots for merchants; increased commerce from trade routes; increased commerce from corporations
TEXT.French: Vous pouvez embaucher deux fois plus de marchands ; les routes commerciales et les sociétés commerciales rapportent du commerce additionnel
TEXT.German: Double available slots for merchants; increased commerce from trade routes; increased commerce from corporations
TEXT.Italian: Double available slots for merchants; increased commerce from trade routes; increased commerce from corporations
TEXT.Spanish: Double available slots for merchants; increased commerce from trade routes; increased commerce from corporations

TEXT.English: Increased wonder production speed; extra unhappiness from state religion; extra happiness from Pagan Temples
TEXT.French: Vitesse de production accélérée pour les merveilles ; la religion d'État cause davantage de mécontentement ; les Temples païens créent du bonheur
TEXT.German: Increased wonder production speed; extra unhappiness from state religion; extra happiness from Pagan Temples
TEXT.Italian: Increased wonder production speed; extra unhappiness from state religion; extra happiness from Pagan Temples
TEXT.Spanish: Increased wonder production speed; extra unhappiness from state religion; extra happiness from Pagan Temples

TEXT.English: Increased building production in cities with state religion
TEXT.French: Vitesse de production accélérée pour les bâtiments dans les villes avec la religion d'État
TEXT.German: Increased building production in cities with state religion
TEXT.Italian: Increased building production in cities with state religion
TEXT.Spanish: Increased building production in cities with state religion

TEXT.English: Increased great people birth rate in cities with state religion
TEXT.French: Taux de natalité des personnages illustres augmenté dans les villes avec la religion d'État
TEXT.German: Increased great people birth rate in cities with state religion
TEXT.Italian: Increased great people birth rate in cities with state religion
TEXT.Spanish: Increased great people birth rate in cities with state religion

TEXT.English: Extra happiness from non-state religions; increased culture in capital; can train missionaries without monasteries
TEXT.French: Les religions non officielles créent du bonheur ; culture augmentée dans la capitale ; vous pouvez produire des missionnaires sans monastère
TEXT.German: Extra happiness from non-state religions; increased culture in capital; can train missionaries without monasteries
TEXT.Italian: Extra happiness from non-state religions; increased culture in capital; can train missionaries without monasteries
TEXT.Spanish: Extra happiness from non-state religions; increased culture in capital; can train missionaries without monasteries

TEXT.English: Extra experience for land units; reduced growth rate for Cottages, Hamlets and Villages; extra gold on city conquest
TEXT.French: Les unités terrestres reçoivent de l'expérience additionnelle ; taux de croissance réduit pour les cottages, hameaux et villages ; vous recevez plus d'or au moment de conquérir des villes
TEXT.German: Extra experience for land units; reduced growth rate for Cottages, Hamlets and Villages; extra gold on city conquest
TEXT.Italian: Extra experience for land units; reduced growth rate for Cottages, Hamlets and Villages; extra gold on city conquest
TEXT.Spanish: Extra experience for land units; reduced growth rate for Cottages, Hamlets and Villages; extra gold on city conquest

TEXT.English: Extra commerce in capital from vassal cities; military units are produced with food; extra commerce from trade routes
TEXT.French: Commerce additionnel dans la capitale pour chaque ville vassale ; les unités militaires sont produites avec de la nourriture ; les routes commerciales rapportent du commerce additionnel
TEXT.German: Extra commerce in capital from vassal cities; military units are produced with food; extra commerce from trade routes
TEXT.Italian: Extra commerce in capital from vassal cities; military units are produced with food; extra commerce from trade routes
TEXT.Spanish: Extra commerce in capital from vassal cities; military units are produced with food; extra commerce from trade routes

TEXT.English: Extra free specialist in all cities; no foreign trade routes
TEXT.French: Un spécialiste gratuit dans chaque ville ; pas de routes commerciales étrangères
TEXT.German: Extra free specialist in all cities; no foreign trade routes
TEXT.Italian: Extra free specialist in all cities; no foreign trade routes
TEXT.Spanish: Extra free specialist in all cities; no foreign trade routes

TEXT.English: Extra commerce in capital from colonies; extra production and commerce for Slave Plantations; extra experience for water units; can capture slaves
TEXT.French: Commerce additionnel dans la capitale pour chaque colonie ; les plantations à esclaves rapportent de la production et du commerce additionnels ; les unités navales reçoivent de l'expérience supplémentaires ; vous pouvez capturer des esclaves
TEXT.German: Extra commerce in capital from colonies; extra production and commerce for Slave Plantations; extra experience for water units; can capture slaves
TEXT.Italian: Extra commerce in capital from colonies; extra production and commerce for Slave Plantations; extra experience for water units; can capture slaves
TEXT.Spanish: Extra commerce in capital from colonies; extra production and commerce for Slave Plantations; extra experience for water units; can capture slaves

TEXT.English: Can draft units; extra production from Towns
TEXT.French: Vous pouvez conscrire des unités ; les villes rapportent de la production additionnelle
TEXT.German: Can draft units; extra production from Towns
TEXT.Italian: Can draft units; extra production from Towns
TEXT.Spanish: Can draft units; extra production from Towns

TEXT.English: Can hurry unit production by sacrificing population; extra happiness from Palace and Monument
TEXT.French: Vous pouvez accélérer la production en sacrifiant de la population ; le Palais et les Monuments créent du bonheur
TEXT.German: Can hurry unit production by sacrificing population; extra happiness from Palace and Monument
TEXT.Italian: Can hurry unit production by sacrificing population; extra happiness from Palace and Monument
TEXT.Spanish: Can hurry unit production by sacrificing population; extra happiness from Palace and Monument

TEXT.English: Faster improvement construction; extra food from Plantations
TEXT.French: Vitesse de construction des améliorations augmentée ; les plantations rapportent de la nourriture supplémentaire
TEXT.German: Faster improvement construction; extra food from Plantations
TEXT.Italian: Faster improvement construction; extra food from Plantations
TEXT.Spanish: Faster improvement construction; extra food from Plantations
